question: What is the oxidation number of S in <katex>$H_{2}S_{2}O_{8}$</katex>?
explanation: In peroxodisulphuric acid (<katex>$H_2S_2O_8$</katex>), there is a peroxide linkage. The structure is <katex>$HO-SO_2-O-O-SO_2-OH$</katex>. Calculating with peroxide oxygen as -1 and oxide as -2: <katex>$2(+1) + 2(x) + 6(-2) + 2(-1) = 0 \Rightarrow 2 + 2x - 12 - 2 = 0 \Rightarrow 2x = 12 \Rightarrow x = +6$</katex>.
